Actors: Melissa McCarthy, Elizabeth Banks, Maya Rudolph, Joel McHale
Writer: Todd Berger (screenplay by), Todd Berger (story by), Dee Austin Robertson (story by)
Plot: When the puppet cast of an '80s children's TV show begins to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.
Title: The Happytime Murders
